```{r cars}
# Load required package
library(ISLR)

# Set seed for reproducibility
set.seed(1)

# Standardize the USArrests dataset (zero mean, unit variance)
dsc <- scale(USArrests)

# Compute squared Euclidean distances between observations
a <- dist(dsc)^2

# Compute correlation-based dissimilarity: 1 - correlation
# Use transpose to compute correlation between variables, not observations
b <- as.dist(1 - cor(t(dsc)))

# Compute and summarize the ratio of correlation-based dissimilarity to squared Euclidean distance
summary(b / a)

```
